vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀπελλῆς, -οῦ, accusative -ῆν (MM, see word), ὁ
Apelles: Rom.16:10.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rom.16.10
§ Apelles, Proper name, Rom. 16:10*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞比利 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "被召的"
某個基督徒 (羅 16:10)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚比利 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "被召的"
某个基督徒 (罗 16:10)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: A-be-lơ: người được tiếp nạp trong Ðấng Christ. Tên latin.
